reviewText: I like her humor because she uses life, which life can be funny in itself at times if you let it be, I really do enjoy her humor!!!!  She is a riot.

All of Loretta LaRoche's books and DVD's are excellent.  I especially liked the DVD Humor Your Stress because I am of Italian decent and she talks about alot of Italian sayings and traditions.  My mother, aunt and cousins enjoyed it so much.  She reminds us to laugh at ourselves, especially thru these trying times.  Remember to laugh, laugh and laugh again.
When dealing with stress, laughter can help. This is wonderful fun with helpful insight, too.

This tape is an outstanding reminder about not taking life too seriously.  She has excellent suggestions for dealing with common stressors and how to lighten up.  I recommend it for anyone in a stressful situation at work or in their personal life.

I'm not very high on self-help or motivational videos of any kind, so I wasn't overly excited about having to watch a video about stress during a recent workshop meant to reenergize me for the coming months.  I have to say that I did heartily enjoy this video, though.  Actually, when I first saw a video by L. LaRoche on the agenda, I was trying to figure out why in the world Lyndon LaRouche was making a video about stress.  Of course, this is actually Loretta LaRoche, and she turned out to be one of the funniest speakers I have ever heard.  She does present some useful ideas for handling stress, from common sense notions to such interesting ideas as giving yourself a big "ta da" every so often and twirling while delivering bad news.  These more audacious suggestions are not things one would really want to do in real life, particularly Negative Neds such as myself, but the general idea of her message is what matters.  LaRoche does encourage positive thinking and suggests way in which you can get more joy and less stress out of both work and life in general.  Even if you get absolutely nothing from this video in terms of lowering your stress level, it's still worth watching for the laughs LaRoche provides; she is hilarious, much funnier than most comedians.

This video had me laughing out loud for an hour, and now I find myself using some of her techniques (like standing on one leg while delivering bad news to my boss).  Having ordered several of her videos for our company  library, I felt that I should preview them.  We had to order another copy  of this video for our library as the waitlist for it is never empty.  I  recommend this video for anyone experiencing stress at work, home, school,  in traffic, which would be ... well, just everyone, wouldn't it?
Loretta is a joy to watch.  Her facial expressions  add so much to the words she speaks.  She has a true gift.  Tah - dah!
It was not in playable condition when received. Closer inspection revealed a small crack on the surface.
it was OK. I'd rather see it live.
Right on!!
Loretta is just the funniest person. If you want a good laugh you have to get this one.
Very funny!
I'm planning on using this for an evening of fun.  She certainly knows how to relieve stress.  Great DVD!  Thanks.  Sister Rose Theree
There is no one funnier than this down to earth lady.  Everyday humor we can relate too.  Love her videos.
Stress to a point is a good thing, but when it becomes the only thing- well Loretta has a cure and if not a cure at least a remedy.

Loretta is so funny and gets a useful message across about life's stresses.  Everyone would benifit from this c.d. I have been showing it to my friends and am going to show it at my next Senior Citizens meeting.
glad i ordered these they are funny and up lifting on a dark day i hope more like these come out soon
Strategies for fun and stress management!
Funny presentation on handling stress
She is wonderful.  Since I work in the Mental Health Field and am encouraged to watch my own mental health, this is very useful.

She is absolutely hilarious
A must have
There is nothing that gets you back on track re dealing with stress than watching Loretta LaRoche videos.
I did not purchase this item.you sold it to someone else.
You will shake with laughter while learning how to handle stress. I wish there was a volume two!
Pretty good - her specials/movies are better imo. The book has a good message though and is easy to read.
I use in a group to look at stress and stress management. My clients love it!
